name: Trash Doves - A Bird Sticker Game
name_original: Trash Doves - A Bird Sticker Game
description:
Trash Dove is here and traveling around the world! Help the large-eyed purple pigeon to travel around the whole planet! The adventure starts suddenly in Thailand and help to reach all the iOS devices in the shortest time! This headbanging purple pigeon internet meme will be the next Floppy disc emoticon! So know your meme don't be a troll and follow the bird!
Control is easy and the is fun:
- Tap to bow!
- Release to up!
- Share your Score!

If you have any suggestions or problems using the app, please email us. This will help us make the app better.
Please, don't forget to tell your experiences, rate our app, and post a comment!

Stay in touch to hear about new releases and promotions, visit the developer on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/levelonegames2015/
